title: T206 hall of famers for sale
author: LEIDEMEG

posts.post_title: T206 hall of famers for sale
posts.post_content:
Scans are below-----Hello, for sale are some hall of famers from my T206 collection. Price is delivered to your door. Paypal is fine(please do friends and family as a payment choice if possible). Paypal goes to [url]leidemeg@comcast.net[/url] 
Thanks, George

Tris Speaker, PSA 2-$SOLD
Hugh Duffy, PSA 4.5(perfect centering)-$SOLD
Vic Willis Throwing, PSA 4-SOLD Thanks Mike
McGraw Portrait No Cap, PSA 4-$250
Mordecai Brown Portrait PSA 3.5-SOLD
Marquard, Hands at Thighs PSA 3.5-SOLD. Thanks Mike
Crawford, Throwing PSA 3-$135
Walter Johnson, Hands at Chest(back damage) Sweet Caporal 350-$SOLD
Lundgren, Chicago(rarity) PSA 3.5(beauty-centered)-SOLD Thanks Hank
Keeler, Portrait(beauty) PSA 4.5-$SOLD
Griffith, Portrait-PSA 4-SOLD, Thanks Mike
Cy Young, Bare hand Shows PSA 3, Sweet Caporal 150, Factory 30 -$SOLD
Christy Mathewson Dark Cap, PSA 4, Sweet Caporal 350-460, Factory 25-$650
Front and Back. The only card with a back issue is Walter Johnson. Thanks, George

Hi George,

I'll take the Willis, Griffith, and Marquard cards.  PM sent.  Thanks.

Mike
